clothes.name: Regular-Fit Linen-Blend Pants
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit pants in an airy, woven cotton and linen blend with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband and zip fly with button. Side pockets and a welt back pocket. Cotton and linen blends combine the softness of cotton with the sturdiness of linen, creating a beautiful, textured fabric that is breathable and perfectly draped.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature. Do not dry-clean.
clothes.Delivery and payments: SHIPPING: Shipping is available to customers at least 13 years of age with a valid US shipping and billing address. H&M HOME furniture, shelving, lighting and area rugs can only be shipped via standard shipping. Orders placed using any other method will be cancelled and a refund will be issued. PAYMENT: We accept card payments via Visa, Apple Pay, MasterCard, Discover and American Express. You can also pay with Klarna's flexible payment options, PayPal and H&M Gift Cards. Learn more on our customer service pages.

clothes.name: Slim-Fit Chino Pants
clothes.Description & fit: Slim-fit chino pants in woven cotton twill with a sleek, modern silhouette. Button and zip fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Classic chino styling perfect for both casual and smart-casual occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature. Do not dry-clean.

clothes.name: Regular-Fit Cotton T-Shirt
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a classic crew neckline and short sleeves. Perfect basic piece for everyday wear and layering.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Muscle-Fit Graphic T-Shirt
clothes.Description & fit: Muscle-fit T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed design on the front. Crew neckline and short sleeves. Close-fitting silhouette that follows the body's contours.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Relaxed-Fit Flannel Shirt
clothes.Description & fit: Relaxed-fit shirt in soft cotton flannel with a classic check pattern. Spread collar, button placket, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Two chest pockets with flaps. Perfect for casual weekend wear.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Slim-Fit Denim Jeans
clothes.Description & fit: Slim-fit jeans in washed denim with a modern, tapered silhouette. Five-pocket styling with button and zip fly. Slightly stretchy for comfort and mobility.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Regular-Fit Straight Jeans
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit jeans in classic denim with a straight leg and comfortable fit. Five-pocket styling with button and zip fly. Timeless straight-leg silhouette that works for any occasion.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Regular-Fit Hoodie
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit hoodie in soft cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and long sleeves. Ribbed cuffs and hem. Perfect for casual wear and layering.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Oversized Zip-Up Hoodie
clothes.Description & fit: Oversized zip-up hoodie in soft cotton blend with a relaxed fit. Lined hood with drawstring, full-length zip, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders for a contemporary silhouette.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Regular-Fit Blazer
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit blazer in woven fabric with a classic silhouette. Notched lapels, button placket, and side pockets. Fully lined for a premium feel. Perfect for business and formal occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Dry clean only.

clothes.name: Classic Crew Neck Sweater
clothes.Description & fit: Classic crew neck sweater in soft knit fabric with ribbed neckline, cuffs, and hem. Regular fit with a timeless silhouette perfect for layering or wearing alone.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Lay flat to dry. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Relaxed-Fit Linen Blend Blouse
clothes.Description & fit: Relaxed-fit blouse in an airy linen blend with a soft drape and comfortable fit. V-neckline, three-quarter length sleeves with button cuffs, and a slightly curved hem. Perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Hang to dry. Iron medium temperature. Do not dry-clean.

clothes.name: Nirvana Fitted T-Shirt
clothes.Description & fit: Fitted T-shirt in soft ribbed cotton jersey with a crew neckline and short sleeves. Close-fitting silhouette that follows the body's contours. Perfect basic piece for layering.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Straight High Ankle Jeans
clothes.Description & fit: High-waisted straight leg jeans in washed denim with a vintage-inspired fit. Five-pocket styling with button and zip fly. The straight leg creates a flattering silhouette that works with any shoe style.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Midi Wrap Dress
clothes.Description & fit: Midi-length wrap dress in woven fabric with an all-over floral print. V-neckline, short sleeves, and tie belt at waist. The wrap style creates a flattering silhouette suitable for both day and evening wear.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Hang to dry. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Cropped Cardigan
clothes.Description & fit: Cropped cardigan in soft knit with button closure, V-neckline, and long sleeves. Ribbed cuffs and hem. Perfect layering piece that pairs well with high-waisted bottoms.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Lay flat to dry. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Wide High Jeans
clothes.Description & fit: Wide-leg trousers in woven fabric with an elastic waistband and relaxed, flowing silhouette. Side seam pockets and a comfortable fit that's perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Rib-knit peplum top
clothes.Description & fit: Camisole in smooth satin with adjustable shoulder straps and a straight-cut hem. Elegant piece perfect for layering under jackets or wearing on its own for evening occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Hang to dry. Iron low temperature.

clothes.name: Denim Jacket
clothes.Description & fit: Classic denim jacket in washed cotton denim with a regular fit. Point collar, button placket, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Two chest pockets with flaps and two side pockets. Timeless style that complements any outfit.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Pleated Mini Skirt
clothes.Description & fit: Mini skirt in woven fabric with pressed pleats and a flattering A-line silhouette. Concealed zip at back and regular waist. Perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Hang to dry. Iron medium temperature.

clothes.name: Oversized Blazer
clothes.Description & fit: Oversized blazer in woven fabric with a relaxed fit and contemporary silhouette. Notched lapels, button closure, and long sleeves. Two front pockets and one chest pocket. Perfect for creating polished looks with a modern edge.
clothes.Care instructions: Dry clean only. Do not wash, bleach, or tumble dry.

clothes.name: Open-Back Denim Dress
clothes.Description & fit: Open-back denim dress in a relaxed fit with a flattering silhouette. Adjustable straps and a concealed zip at the side. Perfect for warm days and casual outings.
clothes.Care instructions: Dry clean only. Do not wash, bleach, or tumble dry.

clothes.name: 6-piece Bodysuit and Pants Set
clothes.Description & fit: Oversized blazer in woven fabric with a relaxed fit and contemporary silhouette. Notched lapels, button closure, and long sleeves. Two front pockets and one chest pocket. Perfect for creating polished looks with a modern edge.
clothes.Care instructions: Dry clean only. Do not wash, bleach, or tumble dry.

clothes.name: 5-pack Wrapover Bodysuits
clothes.Description & fit: Oversized blazer in woven fabric with a relaxed fit and contemporary silhouette. Notched lapels, button closure, and long sleeves. Two front pockets and one chest pocket. Perfect for creating polished looks with a modern edge.
clothes.Care instructions: Dry clean only. Do not wash, bleach, or tumble dry.
